GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.32 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
KVM: SVM: Don't BUG if userspace injects an interrupt with GIF=0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit c3396c1c8b87510f2ac2a674948156577559d42d, it was introduced in version v2.6.32 by commit 219b65dcf6c0bad83d51bfa12e25891c02de2414. For more details please see the references link.
